This may be posted somewhere else, but I'm wondering how do you activate all RCS modules at the same time? Because I've built a rover, and the RCS thing is the only thing that supposed to slow me down for the last few meters. I just can't find a way to make all of the (they are the linear RCS things, all pointing downwards) go at full thrust and all at the same time.

Is there even a way to do this?

Hi XOOM

I assume you don't mean the R for RCS key, but how to thrust with RCS, just use IJKL as if they were WASD, and use HN for up and down.

Hope this helps
Yup, that was what I was looking for. Thanks mate
